name: Apoptosis (Ferruccio Cinquemani)
description:
A prototype of a minimalist puzzle game inspired by the biological mechanism of apoptosis, the programmed death of cells.

Click on a healthy cell to reduce its health. When at 0, a healthy cell will destroy itself and reduce the health of all surrounding cells.

The goal of each level is to destroy all black cells within the turn limit and without sacrificing more cells than allowed.

This is a prototype with only 15 levels. Let me know if you liked it or not in the comments. If there's interest I might keep working on it.

Thanks!

Controls Desktop:

- Left and right mouse button

- R to quickly reload a level

Controls Mobile:

- Tap to decrease the value of a cell

- Long press to increase the value of a cell
